head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths ALLMAN, HELEN SLATER

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths ALLMAN, HELEN SLATER

block.p: ALLMAN-Helen Slater. Age 93, of Ridgewood, NJ, and formerly of Ronan, Montana, on September 27, 2000. Wife of the late Charles A. Allman. Loving mother of Phoebe A. MacGillivary of Ridgewood, NJ, and Leesville, NY, and Willard S. Allman of Wyckoff, NJ. Adored grandmother of Stefanie Alison Allman. Services are private.
